org.stellar.sdk

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stellar.sdk.Transaction

  • public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents Transaction in Stellar network.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Transaction.Builder
      Builds a new Transaction object.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

        Generates Transaction XDR object.

      • toEnvelopeXdr

        public org.stellar.sdk.xdr.TransactionEnvelope toEnvelopeXdr()
        Generates TransactionEnvelope XDR object. Transaction need to have at least one signature.

      • toEnvelopeXdrBase64

        public java.lang.String toEnvelopeXdrBase64()
        Returns base64-encoded TransactionEnvelope XDR object. Transaction need to have at least one signature.
